entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -4.4°C

Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
